Interface QueryApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface QueryApi

      Class representing a page of content.

      Directions for sort.

      Count all items of a given type.

      Count items accessible to a given user.

      Set all filters for this query, parsing the key/predicate/value from string values.

      Set the query result order.

      QueryApi.Page<E>      		 page(Class<E> cls)
      Return a Page instance containing a total of total items, and an iterable for the given page/count.

      Return a Page instance containing a total of total items, and an iterable for the given page/count.

      Set the limit of this query.
      QueryApi setOffset(int offset)
      Set the offset of this query.
      QueryApi setStream(boolean stream)
      Toggle streaming, which will disable paging totals, assuming an infinite collection.

    • Method Detail

      • setOffset

        QueryApi setOffset(int offset)
        Set the offset of this query.
        Parameters:
        offset - the number of items to skip
        Returns:
        a new query

      • setLimit

        QueryApi setLimit(int limit)
        Set the limit of this query.
        Parameters:
        limit - the limit of the number of items returned
        Returns:
        a new query

      • filter

        QueryApi filter(String key,
                QueryApi.FilterPredicate predicate,
                Object value)
        Add a filter predicate.
        Parameters:
        key - a filter key
        predicate - a predicate
        value - the filter predicate
        Returns:
        a new query with the filter added

      • filter

        QueryApi filter(Collection<String> filterSpecs)
        Set all filters for this query, parsing the key/predicate/value from string values.
        Parameters:
        filterSpecs - a set of filter spec strings
        Returns:
        a new query with previous filters replaced

      • orderBy

        QueryApi orderBy(String key,
                 QueryApi.Sort order)
        Set the query result order.
        Parameters:
        key - a order key
        order - an order spec
        Returns:
        a new query with the ordering added

      • orderBy

        QueryApi orderBy(Collection<String> orderSpecs)
        Set all orderings for this query, parsing the key/spec from string values.
        Parameters:
        orderSpecs - a set of order spec strings
        Returns:
        a new query with previous filters replaced

      • setStream

        QueryApi setStream(boolean stream)
        Toggle streaming, which will disable paging totals, assuming an infinite collection.
        Parameters:
        stream - whether to assume streaming
        Returns:
        a new query with streaming enable/disabled

      • page

        <E extends Entity> QueryApi.Page<E> page(Class<E> cls)
        Return a Page instance containing a total of total items, and an iterable for the given page/count.

        Return a Page instance containing a total of total items, and an iterable for the given page/count.

      • page

        <E extends Entity> QueryApi.Page<E> page(String key,
                                         String query,
                                         Class<E> cls)
        Return a Page instance containing a total of total items, and an iterable for the given page/count.

      • count

        long count(Iterable<?> vertices)
        Count items accessible to a given user.

      • count

        long count(EntityClass type)
        Count all items of a given type.

        NB: Count doesn't 'account' for ACL privileges!
